name: number-filter-query
description: Filters based on a number column. Requires a column, an operator, and a list of values.

column.description: The column to apply filter for. Choose an appropriate column name based on user input from filterable_columns.number list.

operator.description: The filter operator. 'is-null' means empty, 'not-null' means not empty, '=' means equal to, '!=' means not equal to, '<' means less than, '<=' means less than or equal to, '>' means greater then, '>=' means greater than or equal to. For 'is-null' and 'not-null' operators set an empty values array. '=', '!=' operators support multiple values, with 1 value being required. '<', '<=', '>', '>=' operators support 1 value only. 'between' operator requires 2 values, where the first value is the start of the interval and the second value is the end of the interval.
